```{r education}

library(tibble)
edu <- tribble(
  ~ Degree, ~ Year, ~ Institution, ~ Where,
  "Dr. rer. nat. Psychology", "2013", "Georg-August-Universität Göttingen", "Göttingen, Germany",
    "B.S. Psychology, summa cum laude", "2009", "University of Wisconsin - Green Bay", "Green Bay, WI, USA"
) %>% 
  detailed_entries(Degree, Year, Institution, Where)

```
